title: My phone was hacked Probably through my F.B. account. Opened MLB app & installed. How get them out
content:
I want to get them out. They also put flags up while I was in F. B.
I was told to do factory reset, or Norton has deals on programs. There's one for viruses. Also, Google told me I had 1 virus.
Days later they put up the same page &said I had 3 viruses,and 
they would soon shut the phone off. What is the best course of action?
